Modified Protein Balls

Low Omega-6 version of peanut butter protein balls using macadamia butter.

View On GitHub

    Modified Protein Balls

    Low Omega-6 version of peanut butter protein balls using macadamia butter.

    Ingredients

    • 1 cup macadamia nut butter
    • 2 scoops whey isolate or sunflower seed protein
    • 1–2 tbsp coconut flour
    • 1/3 cup Lily’s chocolate chips
    • Swerve (or MonkFruit or erythritol), to taste
    • Dash of vanilla extract, salt, cinnamon
    • {"Optional"=>"2 tbsp unsweetened coconut flakes"}

    Instructions

    1. Mix nut butter and protein powder.
    2. Add coconut flour gradually.
    3. Stir in remaining ingredients.
    4. Roll into balls and chill.

    Nutrition Info

    • Servings: 24–30 balls
